page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SIMON.
page.content: Monday 7.30am. I would wake up,turn on my stereo,have a wash and change into my school uniform.Next would be breakfast,toast or cornflakes with a cup of tea.Then I give my teeth the full cleaning treatment,followed by a round of snooker with my kid brother. At 8.30pm. I leave home and cycle to school.The journey is two miles long. When I reach school I have a game of football or bulldog in the yard with some friends.At school we study maths, English,history,science,geography and french.The school day ends at 3.20pm. At home I will make myself a cup of tea and eat some biscuits,while watching T.V.Then I do my homework. Then I either play games on my computer or go to a youth club.
